comments.author: norrisboyd@gmail.com
comments.body:
Patch checked in:

Checking in org/mozilla/javascript/drivers/ShellTest.java;
/cvsroot/mozilla/js/rhino/testsrc/org/mozilla/javascript/drivers/ShellTest.java,v  <--  ShellTest.java
new revision: 1.2; previous revision: 1.1
done

description:
Created attachment 265886
patch v1

Bug 379779 created a new top level shell.js to consolidate common code however the Rhino test driver did not include this script which resulted in multiple failures when running the JavaScript Test suite in Rhino.

This patch adds the top level shell.js to the helper list as well as excludes the template.js files which are not actual test files.
summary: Rhino tests broken due to change in shell.js locations.
